skills.name: BOMB
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• 45% Chance to inflict up to 2 Magic Burns.
• Damage increases based on your MAX HP and DEF

skills.name: DECAY
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• Damage dealt increases based on your DEF.
• Inflicts Additional True Damage for every damage over time effect on the target.

skills.name: EXPLODE
desc: Explodes upon death, dealing true damage to all enemies based on the [32CD32]MAX HP[-] of you and the enemy.
